root.name: Supercar Challenge
root.description: Overview.Supercar Challenge is the follow up game to the System 3/Eutechnyx release Trofeo Pirelli Ferrari Challenge. The game now includes super cars from other marquees apart from Ferrari and several new tracks and improved AI. Cars.Supercar Challenge includes cars from several manufacturers, some are playable immediately, others are unlocked as the game progresses via reward. Many of the cars from the previous Ferrari Challenge game are included; Aston Martin DBR9.Bugatti Veyron .Chevrolet Corvette C6 .Ferrari 250 . Ferrari 330 . Ferrari 575 . Ferrari 575M Maranello . Ferrari Enzo.Ferrari FXX.Ferrari F430 Scuderia.Ferrari F430 Spider.Ferrari F50 GT.Ferrari 599 . Ferrari California.Koenigsegg CCX.Maserati MC12 . McLaren F1.McLaren SLR.McLaren Stirling Moss.Pagani Zonda F. Tracks. Supercar Challenge includes tracks from the previous Ferrari Challenge release as well as from that titles DLC. It also includes tracks that are new to this title. Some tracks are based on their real life counterparts with minor adjustments and name changes presumably due to licensing; Auto Club Speedway . Hockenheim . Homestead . Infineon Raceway.Misano. Misano International Circuit.Monza . Mont Tremblant .Mugello.Nürburgring F1 Course. Paul Ricard . Redwood Park* (Circuit de Gilles Villeneuve). Riviera* (Slightly modified Monaco street circuit).Silverstone GP.Silverstone National.Southern Silverstone . Spa Francorchamps.Vallelunga . Virginia Raceway. Gameplay.Ferrari Challenge includes a robust single player mode which features TUTORIAL, QUICK RACE, ARCADE MODE, a full season CHALLENGE MODE, INVITATIONAL CHALLENGES and SUPERCAR TOURNAMNETS. Tutorial modes are handled and narrated by British touring car driver Tiff Nedell. Online race modes are also available thru the PSN network .
